resources.string: This account doesn\'t seems to have a Minecraft user linked to it. Did you buy Minecraft? You can play the Demo version with the "Play Demo" button below.

This application is not in any way affiliated with Mojang AB.\n This version of Boardwalk is very experimental - world generation may take up to 5 minutes, and multiplayer only works on offline servers.\n These issues are being investigated and might be fixed in a later version.

Your device supports the Android Runtime (ART), which may be able to run Minecraft faster. You can switch to ART by going to Settings, then Developer Settings, then Select Runtime, and finally select Use ART.\n(Other applications may not be ART compatiable, so you might want to switch back to Dalvik when not using Boardwalk.)
Unfortunately, your device is not supported, as this application requires 1GB of memory to convert Minecraft for Android. The application may force close if you try to launch.
Unfortunately, your device is not supported, as this application requires a dual-core CPU or better. Otherwise, the application will run very slowly.
